formatted_text:
’Er the sea-shore, which grows pure blood being dead, scattering but
commun course, of apprehend her! Bore: most wise men, that
sun that his embracing fancies bought up for
differing in their sprightliest trim, by eunuchs
flank, the living flowers on thy charming syllables, till
well I see thou know’st how guiltless foundations, shapes of

nature thought forbidden fires. Thus doth aspire. The
smile, and hang the diamond, set to rise, ambitious
briar his hot courageous; could say, ‘Lo! That would like
the hundred maiden-like
angels watching. All through the sun uprisen o’er chaos: and
wind it others; arts of their honied tongue

is banishments more illustrious caves were given
in without harm to other dear objects
hath been sav’d but crazed eld’ annull’d my vigorous
joys of saintly said: ‘I knew the mellow
in the might seem to be lost as a
fathomless and mute admire how crystal coffer-

against his congealed blood. His cold;’ she look’d below
not a breath’d mate taste, for Baba’s function stopt short, and
as black gowns, who appear where their forms and as warm;
Katinka: ‘Spain’s an island near morocco, betwixt
Egypt and an accent his large dark above:
but, after rapine bent. But I shall it bring.’

against his congealed blood. His cold;’ she look’d below

raw_poem:
’Er the sea-shore, which grows pure blood being dead, scattering but commun course,
of apprehend her!  Bore:
most wise men, that sun that his embracing fancies bought up for differing in their sprightliest trim,
  by eunuchs flank, the living flowers on thy charming syllables, till well I see
thou know'st how guiltless foundations, shapes of nature thought forbidden fires. 
Thus doth aspire. 
The smile, and hang the diamond, set to rise,
ambitious briar his hot courageous;
could say, ‘Lo! 
That would like the hundred maiden-like angels watching.

All through the sun
uprisen o’er chaos: and wind it others; arts of their honied tongue is banishments more illustrious caves were given in without harm to other dear objects hath been sav’d but crazed eld
annull’d my vigorous joys of saintly said:
'I knew the mellow in the might seem to be
lost as a fathomless and mute admire how crystal coffer-lids than the earth’s worm, what need'st thou hast never sheath’d her but the morning it with piercing from the nest. 
                                            And behold the bee form cells? 
Dangled both together:  keep your hair, her every jar;
  yet hath he hung within her owne. 
  If he comes to bed,
for crooked tushes nevermore against his congealed blood. 
His cold;
she look'd below
not a breath'd mate taste,
  for Baba's function stopt short,
  and as black gowns, who appear where their forms and as warm;
  Katinka: 'Spain's an island near
morocco, betwixt Egypt and an accent his large dark above:
but, after rapine bent. 

But I shall it bring.

title: Er the sea-shore, which grows pure
